commands.name: az logic workflow identity assign
commands.syntax:
az logic workflow identity assign --name
                                  --resource-group
                                  [--system-assigned {0, 1, f, false, n, no, t, true, y, yes}]
                                  [--user-assigned]

commands.name: az logic workflow identity remove
commands.syntax:
az logic workflow identity remove --name
                                  --resource-group
                                  [--system-assigned {0, 1, f, false, n, no, t, true, y, yes}]
                                  [--user-assigned]
